data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Leon have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jean Meneses for Leon drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Leon to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
In the minute 5, Goal! Maximiliano Perg gives Leon a 1-0 lead in Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Puebla throw-in in Leon's half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Leon's area.
In the minute 9, Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Leon's William Tesillo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 10, In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leon have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Leon are caught offside.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 16, Free kick for Puebla in the half of Leon.
Luis Montes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 19, Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Leon.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Leon.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Emanuel Gigliotti (Leon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Leon throw-in in Puebla's half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Puebla.
Emanuel Gigliotti (Leon) has received a yellow card from Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 29, In Leon Puebla drive forward through Omar Fernandez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Leon.
Angel Mena puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 32, Leon to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Puebla.
Can Puebla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leon's half?
In the minute 37, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 39, Leon are coming forward and Andres Mosquera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Puebla a goal kick.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 42, Leon are pushing forward but Luis Montes's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Leon.
Throw-in for Puebla close to the penalty box.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
The first-half has come to a close in Leon.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Leon's Emanuel Gigliotti breaks free at Estadio Leon. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 46, Puebla have a goal kick.
Puebla make their first substitution with Santiago Ormeno replacing Amaury Escoto.
Salvador Reyes for Puebla gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, The away team replace Pablo Gonzalez Diaz with Daniel Alvarez.
Free kick Puebla.
In the minute 49, Omar Fernandez of Puebla gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Stiven Barreiro is booked for the home team.
Leon are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 52, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
George Corral (Puebla) has been shown a straight red card by referee Cesar Arturo Ramos.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Pedro Aquino.
In the minute 57, Leon's Pedro Aquino is back in action after a slight knock.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 58, Free kick Puebla.
Nestor Vicente Vidrio is on a sub for Christian Tabo for Puebla.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Leon a goal kick.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 62, Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Joel Campbell is replacing Emanuel Gigliotti for the home team.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Puebla drive upfield and Salvador Reyes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leon defender.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Maximiliano Perg (Puebla) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Leon.
Throw-in Puebla.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
In the minute 68, In Leon Leon attack through Joel Campbell. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leon's Angel Mena gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Leon. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 71, Angel Mena for Leon drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla's Brayan Angulo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
In the minute 73, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Puebla needs to be cautious. Leon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Puebla will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Leon.
Leon's Stiven Barreiro gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Leon. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Puebla throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Salvador Reyes with Osvaldo Martinez.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Leon.
Puebla's Omar Fernandez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 80, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Leon a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Fernando Navarro with Jose Rodriguez. This is the second substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Leon.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Free kick Puebla.
In the minute 87, Leon make their third substitution with Nicolas Sosa replacing Angel Mena.
In Leon, Osvaldo Martinez of Puebla is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 88, Juan Reynoso is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Leon with Eduardo Herrera replacing Maximiliano Perg.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for Leon, close to Puebla's area.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jose Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
Leon have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon.
Free kick in a good position for Leon!
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
